data.description: Converts Text to images in various formats
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I was looking for a simple text to image converter and the simplest
    thing I found was PerlMagick which is not really a converter at all.
    Since PerlMagick is a lot more complicated than what I needed I
    started writing a wrapper to it and decided to release it to CPAN.

    I am not sure if the name is correct and would appreciate any
    advice as to what would be suitable. I noticed that I could use

    Convert::ToImage

    but this is not really as descriptive as

    Text::Convert::ToImage

    If the name above is suitable do I also need to register

    Text::Convert

    as a seperate registration because it has not been registered yet
    or will it automatically be registered.

    Regards, Harry
